appName.message: Linkover â€“ Tooltip for links on hover

appDescription.message: Shows info about the link on hover. Loads page title, thumbnail, description, URL and favicon

showOnlyWithModifierKey.message: Show only when modifier key is held (Ctrl,Shift,Alt etc)

mouseMoveDebounceTimeout.message: How often to check element under cursor (ms)

showOnlyWhenThreeDots.message: Show only if text contains three dots (...)

maxCursorSpeed.message: Max cursor speed allowed to trigger

thumbnailOnSide.message: Show thumbnail on the left side

changeColorForProccessedLinks.message: Highlight links which are being loaded

keepShownOnMouseOut.message: Keep tooltip shown on mouse out (for debug)
